To test hypothesis , use crossover vivo experimental model mild asthmatic normal control use state-of-the-art diesel exhaust exposure facility . Participants take N-acetylcysteine ( 600 mg ) placebo capsule three time daily six day . On final morning supplementation , participant expose 2 hour either filter air diesel exhaust ( 300 µg·m-3 particulate matter small 2.5 micron ) . Twenty-six non-smokers 19-49 year study three experimental condition ( filter air placebo , diesel exhaust placebo diesel exhaust N-acetylcysteine ) use randomize , double-blind , crossover design , two week minimum washout condition . Methacholine challenge perform pre-exposure ( determine baseline airway responsiveness ) post-exposure ( determine effect exposure ) .
